alert.note: Alert for Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 12:52PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Poinsett County through 115 PM CDT... At 1252 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marked Tree, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marked Tree, Boat Run, Payneway, Northern Ohio and Old Weona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
